page.title: 06THE FLOWER FESTIVAL
page.content: This festival is a collection of flower arrangements based on a theme inside the church,for people to come and look at and enjoy.The idea for the flower festival was started by a lady called Mrs Banting,and she now organises the event.They first decided to hold it in 1982.Every 3 years since 1982 we have had a flower festval in our local church which is St Matthews. This year the flower festival was held on June 21,22 and 23.It is not always on the same day or month.Last time it was held in July.The theme this year was Hymns of Praise.Some of the hymns illustrated were Bread of Heaven, All Things Bright and Beautiful and Jerusalem.The money which was raised paid for plaster-work in the church which is urgently needed.Flowers were grown and people came from many places for this special occasion.
